featured.text: Some religious groups organize special healing shrines for the sick.
Studies have proved that watching funny movies can reduce pain and promote healing.
Their consensus, however, is that unless the injury involves something as serious as a broken bone or a ripped muscle, moderate exercise can actually speed healing.
With the imaginative assistance of Dooley, Peanuts discovers the healing power of hope and love.

other.text: The third kind is called “health spas,” or “faith healing.”
You might speed up healing time by gently pressing a warm washcloth 20 your eyelid for 10 minutes, 3 or 4 times a day.

definition.zh_def: 治療，恢復健康的過程或狀態。
definition.en_def: The process or state of becoming sound or healthy again.
definition.example: The healing of the wound took several weeks.
